dateplot1.title: Purchases
dateplot1.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(DATE(time)) + 16 * 3600, -SUM(`amount`) FROM fridays_transactions WHERE user_id < 999999 and amount < 0 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" GROUP BY DATE(time)

dateplot2.title: Deposits
dateplot2.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(DATE(time)) + 16 * 3600, SUM(`amount`) FROM fridays_transactions WHERE user_id < 999999 and amount > 0 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" GROUP BY DATE(time)

dateplot3.title: Balance Change
dateplot3.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(DATE(time)) + 16 * 3600, SUM(`amount`) FROM fridays_transactions WHERE user_id < 999999 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" GROUP BY DATE(time)

dateplot4.title: Balance
dateplot4.query: SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(fridays_transactions.`time`), @running_total := @running_total + fridays_transactions.amount AS cumulative_sum FROM fridays_transactions JOIN (SELECT @running_total := 0) r where user_id < 999999 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot1.title: Number of items purchased
dateplot1.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(DATE(time)) + 16 * 3600, count(`amount`) FROM fridays_transactions WHERE user_id < 999999 and amount < 0 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" GROUP BY DATE(time)

dateplot2.title: Accumulated sum of items
dateplot2.query: SELECT UNIX_TIMESTAMP(`time`), @running_total := @running_total + 1 FROM fridays_transactions JOIN (SELECT @running_total := 0) r where user_id < 999999 and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time;

dateplot1.title: Numer of pylint errors
dateplot1.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_hall WHERE type = (SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="pylint_errors") and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot2.title: Numer of lines of source code
dateplot2.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_hall WHERE type = (SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="lines_of_code") and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot3.title: Pylint errors relative to LOC
dateplot3.query:
select unix_timestamp(pylint_errors.time), (pylint_errors.value / number_of_lines.value) * 100 from
(SELECT time, value FROM dateplots_hall WHERE type = (SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="pylint_errors") and time between "{from}" and "{to}") pylint_errors,
(SELECT time, value FROM dateplots_hall WHERE type = (SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="lines_of_code") and time between "{from}" and "{to}") number_of_lines
WHERE pylint_errors.time = number_of_lines.time ORDER BY pylint_errors.time

dateplot4.title: Numer of Pythons 3 compat. source code
dateplot4.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_hall WHERE type = (SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="lines_of_py3_code") and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time

dateplot5.title: Python 3 compatible LOC relative to LOC
dateplot5.legend: Py3 compat. LOC relative to LOC
dateplot5.query:
select unix_timestamp(lines_of_py3_code.time), (lines_of_py3_code.value / number_of_lines.value) * 100 from
(SELECT time, value FROM dateplots_hall WHERE type = (SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="lines_of_py3_code") and time between "{from}" and "{to}") lines_of_py3_code,
(SELECT time, value FROM dateplots_hall WHERE type = (SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="lines_of_code") and time between "{from}" and "{to}") number_of_lines
WHERE lines_of_py3_code.time = number_of_lines.time ORDER BY lines_of_py3_code.time

dateplot1.query: SELECT unix_timestamp(time), value FROM dateplots_hall WHERE type = (SELECT id FROM dateplots_descriptions where codename="trello_list_unsorted") and time between "{from}" and "{to}" order by time
